people_also_ask.question: Is a portable projector worth it?
people_also_ask.heading: Yes, they're great due to their portable size and simplicity of use. But for a decent mini projector that actually provides a quality picture, you may be in the ballpark of $200. So, this brings us back to the portable nature of mini projectors.
